name: POOP SHOOTER (szarkan)
description:
"by far best game i ever played" - IGN 10/10

"i have a boner cuz of that game" - pewdeipie 11/10

"we wanna hire that man, he's genius!" - valve 10/10

Best game of 2021-2022 - POOP SHOOTER!

main goal - to poop in the toilet and not miss. contorsl: A or D - moving, LMB - shoot a poop, RMB - scope, shift - adjust speed, M - minigun mode on/off
